whyChooseUsItems.title: Pure A2 Goodness
whyChooseUsItems.description: We source directly from our own herd of happy, grass-fed Gir cows.

whyChooseUsItems.title: Freshness Delivered
whyChooseUsItems.description: Get fresh dairy products delivered to your doorstep, on time, every time.

whyChooseUsItems.title: Ethical & Kind
whyChooseUsItems.description: We are committed to Ahimsa principles, ensuring the welfare of our cows.

testimonials.name: Priya S.
testimonials.quote: The quality of the A2 Ghee is unmatched. It tastes and smells so pure, just like homemade!

testimonials.name: Amit K.
testimonials.quote: Finally, a service that delivers truly fresh and creamy paneer. It made my curry absolutely delicious.

testimonials.name: Rohan M.
testimonials.quote: I love the convenience and the quality. The A2 milk is a staple in my home now. Highly recommended!

testimonials.name: Sunita V.
testimonials.quote: The curd is so thick and creamy, it's perfect for making lassi. My kids love it too!

testimonials.name: Karthik Iyer
testimonials.quote: As someone who is particular about traditional foods, I can vouch for the authenticity of their Bilona Ghee. Excellent product.

testimonials.name: Anjali P.
testimonials.quote: The customer service is as great as their products. They were very helpful with my delivery query. Will be a regular customer.
